plugins.name: General HTML Support
plugins.description: Allows enabling unsupported HTML features at low cost.

htmlOutput._comment: The plugin can output any arbitrary HTML configured by config.htmlSupport option.

plugins.name: Data filter
plugins.description: Adds support for enabling and disabling HTML features and their attributes. Part of General HTML Support feature.

htmlOutput._comment: The plugin can output any arbitrary HTML depending on its configuration.

plugins.name: Data schema
plugins.description: Holds representation of the extended HTML document type definitions. Part of General HTML Support feature.

plugins.name: HTML comment
plugins.description: Preserves the HTML comments in the editor data.

htmlOutput._comment: The plugin can output HTML comments that were added from the editor inital data or by the plugin API.
